title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: July 21, 2023, 03:51:19 PMLast edit: August 18, 2023, 01:39:57 PM by minerjones
content: 2016 Lealana King Kamehameha #19 BUYER FUNDED coinsAll 8 coins from the set are featured and will be bid on individuallyLOT 1: Silver shiny King KLOT 2: Silver matte King KLOT 3: Gold shiny King KLOT 4: Gold matte King KLOT 5: Gilt King K shinyLOT 6: Gilt King K matteLOT 7: Select Gilt King K shinyLOT 8: Select Gilt King K matterSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0170MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN/CHIP PER LOT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 21th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: I have one of these they are HUGE in size, made me laugh when I unwrapped it from the mail, I had no idea.  Question: do these coins have a designated BTC denomination for them? The one I have says on the COA that it’s supposed to be loaded with 1btc but I’m not near the coin and don’t remember if it saying 1btc anywhere on the physical coin. Do they come with public addresses and/or COA’s ?  Sorry for so many questions,  Thank you

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.body: Are these coin Hugger than squirrelbit 60MM

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on July 21, 2023, 04:29:16 PMI have one of these they are HUGE in size, made me laugh when I unwrapped it from the mail, I had no idea.  Question: do these coins have a designated BTC denomination for them? The one I have says on the COA that it’s supposed to be loaded with 1btc but I’m not near the coin and don’t remember if it saying 1btc anywhere on the physical coin. Do they come with public addresses and/or COA’s ?  Sorry for so many questions,  Thank you Correct, they were originally to be all loaded with 1BTC eachI am in the process of contacting original seller to see if they have the addresses/COAs
